summary:
I am a consultant, researcher and translator. As a researcher I published widely on development issues, structural adjustment, poverty, corruption and human rights. I also volunteered as NGO consultant. I guided asylum seelers on asylum procedures and family reunion. I also have teaching experience in economics, political economy and philosophy.

Specialties: Translation, writing, research, coaching. consultancy, and teaching.
